definition: a facility in which ball games are played (especially baseball games), place temporarily
details:
noun
- a facility in which ball games are played (especially baseball games)
= example: a facility in which ball games are played (especially baseball games)
= synonyms: ballpark
- a gear position that acts as a parking brake
= example: a gear position that acts as a parking brake
- a large area of land preserved in its natural state as public property
= example: a large area of land preserved in its natural state as public property
= synonyms: parkland
- a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area
= example: a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area
= synonyms: green
- a lot where cars are parked
= synonyms: parking lot, car park, parking area
verb
- place temporarily
= example: place temporarily
- maneuver a vehicle into a parking space
